episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] drove back Team
Rocket, who was causing trouble.

As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] breathed a sigh of relief, Lance
approached [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].

Impressive as always,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].

When I heard Team Rocket was up to no good, I
rushed over here...

but I decided not to intervene when I saw how
hard you were battling.
And that was the right call!

You didn’t need my help at all—you did an
amazing job battling! Seems like you’ve grown
even stronger!

Your Pokémon has responded to your strong and
upstanding nature.

And as a sync pair, you will continue to grow
strong together...
Sorry. I felt like I was being watched.

Hahaha! When I’m on Pasio, I can’t help but get
distracted by how others perceive me.

I want to conduct myself in a manner that befits a
representative of Blackthorn’s dragon masters!
It’s my duty as Pokémon League Champion, too.

(Say it’s also important to
take breaks.)
Yeah. I’m aware of that, of course!

I was actually thinking I might be putting too much
pressure on myself.

(Say you want see what Lance is like
on a day off.)

On a day off, huh? A bit of an unusual request
you’re making...
That sounds like fun, though!

Let’s see... Could you free up your schedule one of
these days?

I’d like to spend some time talking to you while
enjoying a relaxing day off.
Great! Thank you!

I’m looking forward to it,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] went shopping in
town with Lance.
However...
Look, it’s Lance!
He’s looking extra great today!

Seems like I stand out too much. Sorry if this
makes you uncomfortable.
With that said, though...

I don’t mind, because I want to serve as an
example to others of a pure-hearted Trainer.

What else... Oh, and also show people how noble
and strong dragon masters are.

I’ve never thought of all this as a burden or felt
like I wanted to run away from it...

but since this is my day off, how about I show
you a different side of me so we can get to know
each other better?
Hey, stop that!
Shut it and hand it over already!
This is getting to be a bit too noisy...

(Look Lance in the eye and nod
confidently.)
All right!

(Tell him you’re determined to go
for it.)
I knew you’d say that!
Let’s go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

If we combine our strength, our powers will
be superior!
